description: Introduction While Meta’s announced Orion prototype AR Glasses at Meta Connect made big news, there were few technical details beyond it having a 70-degree field of view (FOV) and using Silicon Carbide waveguides. While they demoed to the more general technical press and “influencers,” they didn’t seem to invite the more AR and VR-centric people […]
title: Meta Orion AR Glasses (Pt. 1 Waveguides)
